title: Phebe Novakovic
itunes:title: Phebe Novakovic
description:
Phebe Novakovic, General Dynamics Corp. chairman and CEO, discusses her beginnings in the CIA as a spy, defense spending by the U.S., and the need for a strong military.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
